Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 10/15
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)

General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Orc Sight: Has the Darkvision feature
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)

Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Gnome Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)

Athletics: +31 (strength; master) Medicine: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +24 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Midwifery Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Taldan History Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Plains Lore): Allows taking an automatic 32 on Plains Lore checks
Assurance (Survival): Allows taking an automatic 32 on Survival checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Expeditious Search: Allows Searching at 2x normal Speed
Group Coercion: Allows using Intimidation to Coerce 2 targets
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 40 (dexterity; master) Class DC: Fighter: 41 (strength; master)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increases Weapon Specialization effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +5
Versatile Legend: Attack Legendary (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Master (Advanced Weapons)/Class Master (Fighter)
Weapon Legend: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Expert (Advanced Weapons)
Advanced Weapon Training: Has proficiency with advanced weapons in chosen group equal to martial weapons
Advantageous Assault: (1) Strike on a grabbed, prone, or restrained foe inflicts +damage dice HP damage, or +damage dice + 2 HP if wielded two-handed, even on failure
Aggressive Block: (F) Allows using Shield Block to move a foe 5' or to cause them to become flat-footed (foe's choice)
Agile Grace: Reduces multiple attack penalty with agile weapons to -3/-6
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Assisting Shot: (1) Ranged Strike gives the next ally attack on the target within 1 rd +1 attack if successful, or +2 with a critical success
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Allows making a melee Strike on a foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Blind-Fight: Allows attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Negates flat-footed with hidden foes
Boundless Reprisals: Gives an additional Reaction to use a fighter feat or class feature once per foe turn
Brutal Finish: (1) Ends turn with a two-handed Strike that inflicts +2 damage dice, even on failure
Brutish Shove: (1) Two-handed melee Strike inflicts flat-footed until end of turn; success allows a subsequent Shove
Certain Strike: (1) Strike inflicts normal non-dice damage on failure
Combat Flexibility: Allows using a chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level each day
Combat Grab: (1) Melee Strike with a one-handed weapon allows grabbing the foe with the other hand if successful for 1 rd or until foe Escapes
Combat Reflexes: Gives an additional Reaction to make an Attack Of Opportunity once per turn
Debilitating Shot: (2) Ranged Strike slows the target for 1 rd
Desperate Finisher: (R) Allows using a press action after taking the last action in a turn, losing any further Reactions during the turn
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Disarming Stance: (1) Stance gives +1 to Disarm and +2 vs. Disarm and allows Disarming foes two sizes larger when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Disarming Twist: (1) Strike with a one-handed melee weapon and the other hand free inflicts Disarm on success; failure inflicts flat-footed until the end of turn
Disruptive Stance: (1) Stance allows using Attack Of Opportunity in response to a concentrate action; any successful Strike disrupts
Double Shot: (2) Allows two ranged Strikes against two foes, suffering a -2 attack penalty on each
Double Slice: (2) Allows simultaneous Strikes with two melee weapons
Dual-Handed Assault: (1) With a hand free, increases the damage from a 1-handed weapon with the 2-handed trait by its number of damage dice or a weapon without that trait by one step
Dueling Dance: (1) Stance gives +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Dueling Parry: (1) Gives +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Dueling Riposte: (R) While using Dueling Parry, allows Striking or Disarming a foe who critically fails an attack on self
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
Fearsome Brute: Strikes against frightened foes inflict +frightened value x 2 HP damage
Felling Strike: (2) Successful attack a flying foe causes it to fall 120', and a critical success grounds it for 1 rd
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Attack Master with simple and martial weapons and Attack Expert with advanced weapons of chosen group/Allows using critical specialization effects of all weapons with master proficiency
Flinging Shove: Aggressive Block moves foe 10' (critical success 20') or inflicts flat-footed; Brutish Shove moves foe 10' (failure 5', critical success 20')
Furious Focus: Two-handed power attacks count as single attacks for multiple attack penalty
Graceful Poise: (1) Stance allows Double Slice with an agile weapon to count as one attack
Guardian's Deflection: (R) Gives an adjacent ally +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Guiding Finish: (1) Moves a foe 10' to a spot within reach with a successful Strike (failure moves the foe 5') when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Guiding Riposte: Moves a foe 10' to a spot within reach with a successful Dueling Riposte Strike
Impossible Volley: (3) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty targets all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Dueling Riposte: Gives an additional Reaction to make a Dueling Riposte once per turn
Improved Flexibility: Allows using a chosen fighter feat of up to 14th level each day
Improved Knockdown: Knockdown automatically inflicts a critical Trip
Improved Reflexive Shield: Allows using Shield Block to protect both self and adjacent allies
Improved Twin Riposte: Gives an additional Reaction to make a Twin Riposte once per turn
Incredible Aim: (2) Gives +2 on a ranged Strike that ignores concealment
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gains +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Incredible Ricochet: (1) Follows a ranged Strike with another against the same foe that ignores concealment and cover
Intimidating Strike: (2) Strike inflicts frightened 1 if successful, or frightened 2 with a critical hit
Knockdown: (2) Follows a successful Strike with an Athletics check to Trip
Lunge: (1) Increases melee Strike range by 5'
Lunging Stance: (1) Stance gives +5' reach on Attacks Of Opportunity
Mirror Shield: (R) Reflects a spell back upon the caster with a ranged Strike or spell attack
Mobile Shot Stance: (1) Stance negates Reactions from ranged Strikes and allows using Attack Of Opportunity with a loaded ranged weapon on an adjacent creature
Multishot Stance: (1) Stance reduces Double Shot and Triple Shot penalties to -1 and -2
Orc Ferocity: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point when brought to 0 Hit Points once per day
Paragon's Guard: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Raise A Shield
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Positioning Assault: (2) Moves a foe 5' to within reach on a successful Strike with a 2-handed melee weapon
Power Attack: (2) Strike inflicts 3 extra dice damage; counts as two Strikes for multiple attack penalty
Powerful Shove: Allows using Aggressive Block and Brutish Shove on foes two sizes larger and inflicts 5 HP if a shoved creature hits a barrier
Quick Reversal: (1) Strikes two foes flanking self
Quick Shield Block: Allows using an additional Reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Reactive Shield: (R) Allows Raising A Shield to absorb damage from a melee Strike
Revealing Stab: (2) Leaves a piercing weapon embedded in a corporeal concealed or hidden foe to reveal it to others
Savage Critical: Changes successful rolls of 19 with a legendary weapon into critical successes
Shatter Defenses: (1) A successful Strike vs. a frightened foe inflicts flat-footed while the frightened condition lasts
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, it negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of any remaining damage
Shield Warden: Allows using Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shielded Stride: Allows Striding at half Speed with shield raised without triggering Reactions
Snagging Strike: (1) Strike with other hand free inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd if successful
Spring Attack: (1) Allows Striking a foe after Striding away from another
Stance Savant: (F) Allows entering a stance during initiative
Sudden Charge: (2) Allows making a melee Strike after a double Stride
Sudden Leap: (2) Allows making a Strike during a Leap, High Jump, or Long Jump
Swipe: (2) Allows attacking 2 adjacent foes with a single Strike
Triple Shot: Allows using Double Shot against a single foe or using 2 actions to make 3 ranged Strikes, suffering a -4 attack penalty on each
Twin Parry: (1) Parrying with two weapons gives +1 AC for 1 rd, or +2 AC if either weapon has the parry trait
Twin Riposte: (R) When using Twin Parry, allows Striking or Disarming a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twinned Defense: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Twin Parry
Two-Weapon Flurry: (1) Allows Striking with two weapons
Weapon Legend: Attack Legendary in simple and martial weapons and Attack Master in advanced weapons of chosen group
Weapon Specialization: Gives +4, +6, and +8 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Supremacy: Permanently quickened; may use additional actions only to Strike
Whirlwind Strike: (3) Allows Striking each foe within reach
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Changes successes on Will saves vs. fear into critical successes and reduces the severity of the frightened condition by 1
Determination: (1) Ends a nonpermanent spell (level 10 Will save) or condition affecting self once per day
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Reflexive Shield: Raised shield adds shield bonus to Reflex saves
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 74 allocated
